comment: * Information about where text selection should be.

methods.name: public int getSelectionStartIndex()
methods.comment: * Returns the start index of the text selection.

methods.name: public int getSelectionEndIndex()
methods.comment: * Returns the end index of the text selection.

methods.name: public int getEntityCount()
methods.comment: * Returns the number of entities found in the classified text.

methods.name: public String getEntity(int index)
methods.comment:
* Returns the entity at the specified index. Entities are ordered from high confidence
     * to low confidence.
     *
     * @throws IndexOutOfBoundsException if the specified index is out of range.
     * @see #getEntityCount() for the number of entities available.

methods.name: public float getConfidenceScore(@EntityType String entity)
methods.comment:
* Returns the confidence score for the specified entity. The value ranges from
     * 0 (low confidence) to 1 (high confidence). 0 indicates that the entity was not found for the
     * classified text.

methods.name: public String getId()
methods.comment: * Returns the id, if one exists, for this object.

methods.name: public Bundle getExtras()
methods.comment:
* Returns the extended data. * *

NOTE: Do not modify this bundle.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
